item.title: 3.5.3 Changing the PEM <-> PPK Format
item.description: 3.5.3 Changing the PEM <-> PPK Format Privacy Enhanced Mail (PEM) Generated via ssh-keygen command based on an earlier document in the key pair format used by an OCI instance PuTTY Private Key (PPK) The key format used by PuTTY, which is a format created by default when saved through PuTTY Key Generator PEM to PPK format conversion 1 . PuTTY Post-install Key Generator (http://www.putty.org/) 2. Run the PuTTY Key Generator.
